scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run css:build -- --watch" "chokidar \"src/**/*.html\" \"src/data.json\" \"src/img/**/*\" \"src/js/**/*\" -c \"npm run html:build\" \"cp -rp src/img public\" \"cp -rp src/js public\" "  "live-server --wait=1000 ./public"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run css:build" "npm run html:build" "cp -rp src/img public" "cp -rp src/js public"
scripts.prod: del-cli public/**/*; cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run css:build" "npm run html:build" "cp -rp src/img public" "cp -rp src/js public"
